mapper.insert:
insert into b_form_club_activity (id, apply_date, club, chief_name, chief_id, chief_tel, activity_name, activity_place, activity_time, activity_people, is_apply_fine, activity_info, apply_self_money, apply_reserve_money, self_money, reserve_money, club_id, file_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{club,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chiefName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chiefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chiefTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isApplyFine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applySelfMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyReserveMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{selfMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reserveMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clubId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
mapper.update:
update b_form_club_activity
apply_date = #{applyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
club = #{club,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chief_name = #{chiefName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chief_id = #{chiefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chief_tel = #{chiefTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

activity_place = #{activityPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_time = #{activityTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_people = #{activityPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

apply_reserve_money = #{applyReserveMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
self_money = #{selfMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reserve_money = #{reserveMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
club_id = #{clubId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
file_id = #{fileId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, apply_date, club, chief_name, chief_id, chief_tel, activity_name, activity_place, activity_time, activity_people, is_apply_fine, activity_info, apply_self_money, apply_reserve_money, self_money, reserve_money, club_id, file_id from b_form_club_activity where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
